Message:
One night, the village chief made
an unbelievable declaration.

“As our fields were
burned to ash by demons,
we no longer have enough
food for everyone.

That’s why...”
The village chief’s words fell
into a barely audible mumble.

I caught on as soon as I saw
his darkened expression.
That he meant to lower
the number of mouths to feed.

In the tense air,
the adults slowly turned
their gazes towards
the old and sick...

“You said we would
all help one another!
Things are finally peaceful,
so why...?!”

“...Then, I’ll go out
and gather food myself!

If I can’t find any,
you can just banish me!”

Everyone tried to calm
my stubborn outburst.
But, since they’d all used the last
of their energy that morning,
they soon just let me go.

I have to hurry and find food
for all of us somehow...!
